## Software

### Web:

- [calib](calib.org)

- [OxCal](https://c14.arch.ox.ac.uk/oxcal.html)

### R packages

- rbacon
- Bchron
- oxcAAR (interface to OxCal)

Bchron is easiest to use.


### Exercise 

Use Bchron to calibrate and plot the dates 2450 +/- 30 BP and 2600 +/- 30 BP.


```{r calib, exercise=TRUE, exercise.lines = 5}
library(Bchron)
cal <- BchronCalibrate(    )
summary(cal)
plot(cal)

```


```{r calib-hint}
cal <- BchronCalibrate(ages = c(2450, 2600), ageSds = c(30, 30), calCurves = rep("intcal20", 2))
summary(cal)
plot(cal)
```

Explain why the two dates give such different shaped calibrated dates.
